title: vrndAvana dEvi
sahitya:
vrndAvana dEvi namO namO celva mandara dharana manah-priyaLe vrndAvana dEvi namO namO


caraNam 1    ninna sEvisi udakavanereyalu munna mADida pApa hOguvadu 
inna ippattondu kuladavarigella unnanta vaikuNTha padavIvaLe
    caraNam 2    ondondu daLadalli ondondu mUruti sandaNisuve bahu kupitadali 
bandu kumkuma shankha cakra dharisidare tande nArAyaNa karedoyyuva
    caraNam 3    harige samaprpisda tulasi nirmAlyava koraLoLu dharisi karNadoLiTTare 
durita rAShigaLella anji Odudalive hariyu tannavarendu kai piDiva
    caraNam 4    hattu pradakSiNe hattu vandane mAde uttama vaikuNTha padavIvaLe 
dEva shrI purandara viTTalarAyana dEvi ninna muTTi trAhiyembe
